1.   Definitions.           ----------

          1.1  "Ancillary Agreements" shall mean the following agreements between Inktomi and Microsoft, and all amended versions thereof or successor agreements thereto: (i) the Software Development Agreement of even date herewith; (ii) the Information Services Agreement of even date herewith; (iii) the Loan Agreement of even date herewith, and any and all "Promissory Notes" and/or "New Note" executed pursuant thereto; (iv) the Security Agreement of even date herewith; and (v) the Escrow Agreement of even date herewith.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.   Definitions.           ----------

          1.1  "Ancillary Agreements" shall mean the following agreements between Inktomi and Microsoft: (i) the Software Development Agreement of even date herewith; (ii) the Information Services Contract of even date herewith; (iii) the Credit Agreement of even date herewith, and any and all "IOUs" executed pursuant thereto; (iv) the Collateral Agreement of even date herewith; and (v) the Third Party Agreement of even date herewith.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the names of the Ancillary Agreements introduces uncertainty and contradiction. The contract now uses different terms (e.g., 'Information Services Agreement' vs. 'Information Services Contract,' 'Loan Agreement' vs. 'Credit Agreement') without clarifying if they are the same agreements, leading to potential disputes about which obligations apply.

perturbation.original_text:
12.  Miscellany.           ----------

          12.5  Except as expressly permitted hereunder or in Exhibit F hereto, neither party may transfer, assign or sublicense this Agreement, or any rights or obligations hereunder, whether by contract or by operation of law, except with the express written consent of the other party, and any attempted transfer, assignment or sublicense by a party in violation of this Section shall be void. For purposes of this Agreement, an "transfer" under this Section shall be deemed to include, without limitation, the following: (a) a merger or any other combination of an entity with another party (other than a reincorporation of Inktomi from the State of California to the State of Delaware), whether or not the entity is the surviving entity; (b) any transaction or series of transactions whereby a third party acquires direct or indirect power to control the management and policies of an entity, whether through the acquisition of voting securities, by contract, or otherwise; (c) in the case of Inktomi, the sale or other transfer of Inktomi's search engine business or any other substantial portion of Inktomi's assets (whether in a single transaction or series of transactions), or (d) the transfer of any rights or obligations in the course of a liquidation or other similar reorganization of an entity (other than a reincorporation of Inktomi from the State of California to the State of Delaware). Neither party will unreasonably withhold or delay its consent to a requested transfer, assignment or sublicense. Subject to the provisions of this Section, this Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of each party and their respective successors and assigns.
perturbation.changed_text:
12.  Miscellany.           ----------

          12.5  Except as expressly permitted hereunder or in Exhibit F hereto, neither party may convey, cede or permit this Agreement, or any rights or responsibilities hereunder, whether by agreement or by act of legislation, except with the express written assent of the other side, and any attempted conveyance, cession or permission by a party in violation of this Section shall be invalid. For purposes of this Agreement, a "transfer" under this Section shall be deemed to include, without limitation, the following: (a) a unification or any other consolidation of an entity with another participant (other than a reincorporation of Inktomi from the State of California to the State of Delaware), whether or not the entity is the surviving entity; (b) any transaction or series of transactions whereby a third party acquires direct or indirect power to dictate the direction and strategies of an entity, whether through the acquisition of voting instruments, by agreement, or otherwise; (c) in the case of Inktomi, the sale or other transfer of Inktomi's search engine business or any other significant fraction of Inktomi's holdings (whether in a single transaction or series of transactions), or (d) the transfer of any rights or responsibilities in the course of a wind-up or other similar restructuring of an entity (other than a reincorporation of Inktomi from the State of California to the State of Delaware). Neither party will irrationally withhold or postpone its assent to a requested conveyance, cession or permission. Subject to the provisions of this Section, this Agreement shall be compulsory upon and operate for the advantage of each party and their respective inheritors and assignees.
perturbation.explanation: Substituting 'transfer' with 'conveyance,' 'cede,' or 'permit', 'assign' with 'cede', 'sublicense' with 'permit', 'agreement' with 'assent', 'combination' with 'unification or consolidation,' 'assets' with 'holdings', 'policies' with 'strategies,' and 'obligations' with 'responsibilities' introduces semantic confusion. The original clause aimed to restrict specific actions with clear legal implications; however, the replacements cloud the intent and could lead to varied interpretations of what activities are prohibited, thereby weakening enforcement.
